text: Tulsi also commonly known as holy basil, tulasi or thulasi, is an aromatic plant scientifically known as Ocimum tenuiflorum or Ocimum sanctum. Tulsi is also a given name and surname. Tulsi may refer to: ==People== ==Places== *Tulsi Express, express train belonging to Indian Railways - Central Railway zone that runs between Lokmanya Tilak Terminus & Allahabad Junction in India *Tulsi Lake, a fresh water lake in northern Mumbai, India ==Others== *Tulsi (film), a 2008 film *Tulsi Comics, Indian comics publisher in the late 1980s, 1990s and early 2000s ==See also== * Tulsi in Hinduism, place of a sacred plant in Hindu belief * Tulsi Vivah, the ceremonial marriage of the Tulsi (holy basil) plant to the Hindu god Shaligram or Vishnu or to his avatar, Sri Krishna.
title: Tulsi (disambiguation)
